<JD_START>
Job Title: Tax Manager

Location: Avon, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Want to learn more about this role and Jobot? Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Job details

Tax Manager for one of the top CPA firms in Ohio with hybrid schedule, great benefits, and room for growth!

This Jobot Job is hosted by Tyler Mase

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button and sending us your resume.

Salary $120,000 - $160,000 per year

A Bit About Us

We are one of the top CPA firms in the state of Ohio with offices across the state. We are a TOP Ranked firm with core values are centered around our people and our clients. We believe that putting your employees first is not only the right thing to do, but it also gives us the competitive edge to ensure our clients have an excellent experience! Over the years our reputation for providing our people with the very best has caught the eye of some reputable clients who have chosen to use us as their primary firm!

If you are an experienced Tax Manager who wants to grow your career and work with some of the best in the industry, then please apply!



Why join us?


Do you want to work with some of the nationâ€™s best Clients AND enjoy time at home w/ family? We do too!

 Meaningful Work! Best in Class Firm! Competitive Compensation Package! Complete Benefits Package! 401k match! 4 weeks PTO + 12 paid holidays! Hybrid Work Schedule! Accelerated Career Growth! Fun Company Activities! Many More!

Job Details

We are seeking a highly skilled, experienced, and certified Tax Manager to join our dynamic and growing team. This is a permanent position that offers a unique opportunity to play a high-impact role within our Finance department. The successful candidate will be responsible for managing all aspects of tax compliance, providing tax advice, conducting tax research, and performing federal tax accounting. This role is ideal for a professional who is driven, organized, detail-oriented, and has a knack for finding innovative solutions to complex tax issues.

Responsibilities

 Lead and manage multiple tax engagements to deliver quality tax services for our clients. Provide innovative tax planning, consulting, and compliance expertise to clients. Conduct tax research and planning, identify and mitigate tax risks. Prepare and review federal and state income tax returns and ensure accuracy and compliance with applicable tax laws. Manage a team of tax professionals and supervise their work. Coordinate with accounting staff to gather and analyze financial data. Provide internal tax advice and guidance. Maintain and update working knowledge of tax laws and regulations, including new filing practices, deadlines, and any company-specific information. Collaborate with internal and external auditors during financial and tax audits.

Qualifications

 Bachelor's Degree in Accounting or Finance required. A Masters Degree in Accounting is preferred. Must be a Certified Public Accountant (CPA). Minimum of 3 years of experience in public accounting or a similar role. Proficient in tax analysis, tax research, and tax compliance. Strong knowledge of federal tax accounting and compliance. Demonstrated leadership skills and experience managing a team. Detail-oriented with excellent analytical skills. Strong written and verbal communication skills. Proficient with tax software and Microsoft Office Suite, particularly Excel. Able to handle multiple tasks simultaneously and work under pressure. Strong problem-solving and decision-making skills.

This is an exceptional opportunity for a tax professional looking to further their career in a vibrant, forward-thinking company. If you meet the above qualifications and are ready to take the next step in your career, we encourage you to apply today.

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button.

Want to learn more about this role and Jobot?

Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
